text: Can anyone recommend some resources for drawing things in Python which aren’t plots? For example, infographics, rendering tables, maps etc ?

text: In my experience - and I can’t stress enough I’m saying this as a personal experience thing rather than as an AMZN employee - tiny and small instances suffer more, and tiny more so than small, but YMMV and your application might not be sensitive to it

text: As a general point: the AWS business model is built around shared resources and contention of those resources. If your application is particularly sensitive to contention, perhaps it’s not the optimal environment for that application.
